short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services has issued a Request for Proposal for the acquisition of a zero-turn lawn tractor (including delivery, instruction and maintenance manuals, training, and a 36-month extended warranty) located in Chambly, Quebec, Canada.
description: This procurement is for the acquisition of a zero turn lawn tractor for Parks Canada. The contract includes delivery, instruction, and maintenance manuals, training, and a 36-month extended warranty.
duration_in_months: When the contractor is appointed and accepted by the contracting entity, the contract is expected to start on December 20, 2023, and end on September 19, 2024.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Solicitation Information
### RFP Title
Purchase of Zero Turn Lawn Tractor

### Reference Number
WS4283045549

### Amendment Number
0

### Publication Date
January 8, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
January 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Amendment Date
January 8, 2024

### Expected Contract Start Date
December 20, 2023

### Expected Contract End Date
N/A

## Notice Details
### Category
Goods (GD)
### Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)
### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
### Criteria for Selection
Lowest Price
### Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
### Regions of Opportunity
N/A
### Regions of Delivery

### Contact Information

Catherine Mezey, PSPC
### Email
[catherine.mezey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.mezey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18452882?extsite=MTg0NTI4ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Description of Goods
A zero-turn lawn tractor shall be acquired including delivery, instruction and maintenance manuals, training, and a 36-month extended warranty. Detailed specifications are stated in Annex A. The current bid edition cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number Doc4287338358, which expired on December 1, 2023. Debriefing or feedback sessions for those who previously tendered on the previous solicitation will be arranged upon written request. The successful bidder is expected to deliver and install the lawn tractor in Chambly, Quebec. 
## Bid Closing Date
January 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EST; Sealed submissions should be addressed to the CEO of SPAC. Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5. Please submit a Request for Information (RFI) by email to [catherine.mezey@tp
